text: William R. "Bill" Sinkin (May 19, 1913 â€“ February 3, 2014Solar San Antonio founder Bill Sinkin dead at 100. San Antonio Express-News, 3 February 2014. Retrieved 2014-02-04.) was an American community activist for equality, international cooperation and alternative energy in San Antonio, Texas. He created the company Solar San Antonio. Sinkin died on February 3, 2014 from natural causes in San Antonio, Texas, aged 100. ==References== ==Other websites== *Interviews with William "Bill" Sinkin, June 30 1995, January 17, 2005, University of Texas at San Antonio: Institute of Texan Cultures: Oral History Collections, UA 15.01, University of Texas at San Antonio Libraries Special Collections. title: Bill Sinkin
